original_title: Roman 'Chocolatito' Gonzalez vs. Julio Cesar Martinez
overview: Roman ‘Chocolatito’ Gonzalez returns to the ring against Julio Cesar Martinez. The WBC flyweight champion steps up in weight to face Gonzalez after his original opponent, Juan Francisco Estrada, pulled out of their scheduled trilogy fight.
title: Roman 'Chocolatito' Gonzalez vs. Julio Cesar Martinez
